namespace {

static const char* kTexelsPerWorldUnitFlag                              = "-tw";
static const char* kTexelsPerWorldUnitFlagLong                  = "-texelsperworldunit";
static const char* kSegmentationThresholdFlag                   = "-st";
static const char* kSegmentationThresholdFlagLong               = "-segmentationthreshold";
static const char* kFlatnessFlag                                                = "-f";
static const char* kFlatnessFlagLong                                    = "-flatness";
static const char* kStraightnessFlag                                    = "-s";
static const char* kStraightnessFlagLong                                = "-straightness";
static const char* kCompactnessFlag                                             = "-c";
static const char* kCompactnessFlagLong                                 = "-compactness";

class BeastUVUnwrapItem {
public:
        BeastUVUnwrapItem(beastmaya::ResourceManager& resourceManager, MFnDagNode& dagNode, beastmaya::BeastTargetPtr& target);
        void import();
private:
        MFnDagNode m_dagNode;
        beastmaya::BeastTargetPtr& m_target;
        beastmaya::BeastTargetEntityPtr m_targetEntity;
        std::vector<unsigned int> m_beastToMayaTriMapping;
};

typedef std::shared_ptr<BeastUVUnwrapItem> BeastUVUnwrapItemPtr;

BeastUVUnwrapItem::BeastUVUnwrapItem(beastmaya::ResourceManager& resourceManager, MFnDagNode& dagNode, beastmaya::BeastTargetPtr& target) : 
m_dagNode(dagNode.object()),
m_target(target)
{
        MStatus res;
        MDagPath dagPath;
        res = dagNode.getPath(dagPath);
        if(res != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                throw std::exception("BEAST: Couldn't get DAG path");
        }
        beastmaya::BeastMeshPtr beastMesh = resourceManager.createMesh(dagPath, MObjectArray(), beastmaya::getGuid(), &m_beastToMayaTriMapping);
        if(!beastMesh || m_beastToMayaTriMapping.size() == 0) {
                throw std::exception("BEAST: Failed to export mesh");
        } else {
                m_targetEntity = target->addMeshToTarget(*beastMesh);
        }
}

void BeastUVUnwrapItem::import() {
        MStatus status;

        beastmaya::BeastUVLayerPtr newUVLayer = m_target->getUVLayerFromTarget(*m_targetEntity);

        int width, height;
        m_target->getUVLayerResolutionFromTarget(*m_targetEntity, width, height);

        // Read back uv data from the uv layer
        std::vector<ILBVec2> uvArray;
        std::vector<int> uvIndexArray;
        const int uvArraySize = newUVLayer->getUVArraySize();
        const int uvIndexArraySize = newUVLayer->getIndexArraySize();
        newUVLayer->readUVArray(0, uvArraySize, uvArray);
        newUVLayer->readUVIndexArray(0, uvIndexArraySize, uvIndexArray);

        MDagPath dagPath;
        status = m_dagNode.getPath(dagPath);
        if(status != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                throw std::exception("BEAST: Couldn't get DAG path");
        }

        if (dagPath.extendToShape() != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                // No shape, fail.
                throw std::exception("BEAST: Couldn't find shape");
        }

        MFnMesh mesh(dagPath, &status);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(status);

        MString uvSetName;
        status = mesh.getCurrentUVSetName(uvSetName);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(status);

        // Assign UVs
        MFloatArray u(uvArraySize, 0.0f);
        MFloatArray v(uvArraySize, 0.0f);
        for(int i = 0; i < uvArraySize; ++i) {
                u[i] = uvArray[i].x;
                v[i] = uvArray[i].y;
        }

        status = mesh.clearUVs(&uvSetName);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(status);

        status = mesh.setUVs(u, v, &uvSetName);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(status);

        const int numTriangles = uvIndexArraySize / 3;
        MIntArray uvCount(numTriangles, 3);
        MIntArray uvIds(uvIndexArraySize, 0);
        for (int t = 0; t < numTriangles; ++t) {
                unsigned int mayaTri = m_beastToMayaTriMapping[t];
                for (int v = 0; v < 3; v++) {
                        uvIds[t * 3 + v] = uvIndexArray[mayaTri * 3 + v];
                }
        }
        status = mesh.assignUVs(uvCount, uvIds, &uvSetName);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(status);

        // This is a fix for a problem in Maya, where Maya deletes the new assigned UV's
        // if you switch UV set after the unwrapping is done
        // Deleting the construction history on the object seems to be a workaround
        status = MGlobal::executeCommand("delete -constructionHistory", false, false);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(status);
}

class BeastUVUnwrapper {
public:
        BeastUVUnwrapper(beastmaya::PluginContext& pluginContext, 
                                                float texelsPerWorldUnit, float segmentationThreshold, 
                                                float flatness, float straightness, float compactness);
        void add(MFnDagNode& dagNode);
        bool unwrap();
private:
        beastmaya::ResourceManager& m_resourceManager;
        beastmaya::BeastJobPtr m_job;
        beastmaya::BeastTargetPtr m_target;
        std::vector<BeastUVUnwrapItemPtr> m_uvUnwrapItems;
};

BeastUVUnwrapper::BeastUVUnwrapper(beastmaya::PluginContext& pluginContext, float texelsPerWorldUnit, float segmentationThreshold, float flatness, float straightness, float compactness) : 
m_resourceManager(pluginContext.getResourceManager())
{
        beastmaya::BeastManager& beastManager = pluginContext.getManager();
        m_job = beastManager.createUVJob(L"UnwrapJob");
        m_target = m_job->createUVUnwrapTarget(L"UnwrapTarget", texelsPerWorldUnit, segmentationThreshold, flatness, straightness, compactness);
}

void BeastUVUnwrapper::add(MFnDagNode& dagNode) {
        m_uvUnwrapItems.push_back(BeastUVUnwrapItemPtr(new BeastUVUnwrapItem(m_resourceManager, dagNode, m_target)));
}

bool BeastUVUnwrapper::unwrap() {
        m_job->start(ILB_SR_CLOSE_WHEN_DONE, ILB_RD_FORCE_LOCAL);

        beastmaya::ScopedProgressBar progressBar(true, L"UV Unwrapping");
        progressBar.setProgressMax(100);

        while(m_job->isRunning()) {
                bool newActivity, newProgress;
                if (m_job->hasProgress(newActivity, newProgress)) {
                        std::wstring jobName;
                        int progress;
                        m_job->getProgress(jobName, progress);
                        if (newProgress) {
                                progressBar.setProgress(progress);
                        }
                }
                m_job->waitDone(-1);
        }

        ILBJobStatus status = m_job->getResult();
        if(!beastmaya::checkJobStatus(status)) {
                return false;
        }
        for(auto it = begin(m_uvUnwrapItems); it != end(m_uvUnwrapItems); ++it) {
                (*it)->import();
        }
        return true;
}

}

namespace beastmaya {

extern PluginComponents* g_beastPlugin;

MSyntax BeastUVUnwrapCmd::newSyntax() {
        MSyntax syntax;

        syntax.setObjectType(MSyntax::kStringObjects);

        // Make command non-queryable and non-editable:
        syntax.enableQuery(false);
        syntax.enableEdit(false);

        syntax.addFlag(kTexelsPerWorldUnitFlag, kTexelsPerWorldUnitFlagLong, MSyntax::kDouble);
        syntax.addFlag(kSegmentationThresholdFlag, kSegmentationThresholdFlagLong, MSyntax::kDouble);
        syntax.addFlag(kFlatnessFlag, kFlatnessFlagLong, MSyntax::kDouble);
        syntax.addFlag(kStraightnessFlag, kStraightnessFlagLong, MSyntax::kDouble);
        syntax.addFlag(kCompactnessFlag, kCompactnessFlagLong, MSyntax::kDouble);

        return syntax;
}

MStatus BeastUVUnwrapCmd::doIt(const MArgList& args ) {

        MStatus res;

        MArgParser parser(syntax(), args, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        res = parser.getObjects(m_objects);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        if (m_objects.length() == 0) {
                // Inform user and avoid further error handling.
                MGlobal::executePythonCommandOnIdle("beastUtils.messageBox('information', 'A shape or its transform node must be specified as a command argument, or using your current selection.')");
                return MStatus::kSuccess;
        }

        m_texelsPerWorldUnit = (float)parser.flagArgumentDouble(kTexelsPerWorldUnitFlag, 0, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        
        m_segmentationThreshold =  (float)parser.flagArgumentDouble(kSegmentationThresholdFlag, 0, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        
        m_flatness =  (float)parser.flagArgumentDouble(kFlatnessFlag, 0, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        
        m_straightness =  (float)parser.flagArgumentDouble(kStraightnessFlag, 0, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        
        m_compactness =  (float)parser.flagArgumentDouble(kCompactnessFlag, 0, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        return redoIt();
}

MStatus BeastUVUnwrapCmd::redoIt() {

        try {

                if (g_beastPlugin == NULL) {
                        MGlobal::displayError("Beast plug-in not initialized correctly");
                        return MStatus::kFailure;
                }

                PluginContext& pluginContext = g_beastPlugin->getPluginContext();

                BeastUVUnwrapper unwrapper(pluginContext, m_texelsPerWorldUnit, m_segmentationThreshold, m_flatness, m_straightness, m_compactness);

                bool ignored = false;
                bool added = false;

                for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_objects.length(); ++i) {

                        const MString& objectName = m_objects[i];

                        MObject unknownObject = findMayaNode(objectName.asWChar());
                        if(unknownObject == MObject::kNullObj) {
                                ignored = true;
                                continue;
                        }

                        MStatus status;
                        MFnDagNode node(unknownObject, &status);
                        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(status);

                        // If the names doesn't match some sub-part of a mesh was selected,
                        // this is not supported to ignore the object in that case
                        if (node.fullPathName() != objectName) {
                                ignored = true;
                                continue;
                        }

                        // Check if object is a triangulated mesh
                        if(!isTriangleMesh(node)) {
                                // Inform user and avoid further error handling.
                                MGlobal::executePythonCommandOnIdle(MString(L"beastUtils.messageBox('warning', '") + objectName + L" is not a triangulated mesh')");
                                return MStatus::kSuccess;
                        }

                        unwrapper.add(node);
                        added = true;
                }

                if (!added && ignored) {
                        // Inform user and avoid further error handling.
                        MGlobal::executePythonCommandOnIdle("beastUtils.messageBox('warning', 'Nothing to unwrap. Objects where of unsupported type and ignored.')");
                        return MStatus::kSuccess;
                }

                if(!unwrapper.unwrap()) {
                        MGlobal::displayError("BEAST: Unwrapping failed, unknown error.");
                        return MStatus::kFailure;
                }

        } catch (BeastException& e) {
                if (e.getStatus() == ILB_ST_INVALID_LICENSE) {
                        // This is kind of okay, not really an error. Just post a message that we need a license to run.
                        MGlobal::executePythonCommandOnIdle("beastUtils.messageBox('warning', 'A license error has occurred. Please check that your BEAST_LICENSE environment variable contains a valid license. Command has been canceled.')");
                } else {
                        MGlobal::displayError(e.getTypeString().c_str());
                        MGlobal::displayError(e.getExtendErrorInformation().c_str());
                } 
                return MStatus::kFailure;
        } catch(std::exception& e) {
                MGlobal::displayError(MString(L"BEAST: Unwrapping failed, ") + e.what());
                return MStatus::kFailure;
        } catch(...) {
                MGlobal::displayError("BEAST: Unwrapping failed, unknown exception.");
                return MStatus::kFailure;
        }

        return MStatus::kSuccess;
}

void * BeastUVUnwrapCmd::creator() { 
        return new BeastUVUnwrapCmd(); 
}

bool BeastUVUnwrapCmd::isUndoable() const
{
        return false;
}

bool BeastUVUnwrapCmd::isTriangleMesh(const MFnDagNode& node) const {
        
        MStatus status;
        
        MDagPath dagPath;
        status = node.getPath(dagPath);
        if(status != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                return false;
        }

        if (dagPath.extendToShape() != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                return false;
        }

        if (!dagPath.hasFn(MFn::kMesh)) {
                return false;
        }

        MItMeshPolygon polyIt(dagPath);
        for (; !polyIt.isDone(); polyIt.next()) {
                if (polyIt.polygonVertexCount() != 3) {
                        return false;
                }
        }

        return true;
}
